author: owlthechill
install_msg: Thank you for installing the user-reactions cog! Your bot is now equipped to react to commands with both reactions and personalized messages, adding a touch of personality to your interactions.
name: user-reactions
short: Enhance user interactions with custom reactions and messages.
description: The user-reactions cog for Red-DiscordBot is designed to add personality to your bot by allowing it to react to command messages with both emoji reactions and customizable messages. Choose from a list of pre-defined messages or add your own to create engaging and interactive experiences.
